home.section1: I am a full-stack engineer with {year} years of experience in web development, including experience in real business production. My expertise lies in NextJS frontend development and backend services management. I excel in project management, code review, feature planning, and testing.
home.section2: Additionally, I actively participate in open-source projects online, gaining experience in document writing and feature enhancements. During my leisure time, I explore new technologies to complete my own side projects.
home.section3: I possess a knack for rapid learning to solve problems and exhibit a high level of resilience. I dare to step out of my comfort zone and embrace new endeavors. I am passionate about acquiring knowledge in emerging technologies and finding fulfillment in their achievements. Furthermore, I take pleasure in sharing my skills with others.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a web engineer with over {year} years of development experience, proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, including TypeScript, React, React Native, Next.js, and Nest.js. I have also helped teams adopt tools like Monorepo (Turborepo) to improve cross-project development efficiency. My expertise lies in modular feature development and enhancing developer experience, while adopting modern development processes such as Scrum and CI/CD. I enjoy challenging myself to explore unfamiliar technical areas and quickly mastering related technologies.
about.outside-programming: Outside of programming, I enjoy traveling, playing video games with friends, and watching movies.

location.title: Location
location.description: Here is where I am currently located.

favorite-songs.title: Favorite Songs
favorite-songs.description: Currently, I'm listening to this song.

profile.title: Frontend Developer
profile.content: I am Yu Chia, Yu (俞又嘉), a Frontend Developer specializing in TypeScript, React, NextJS, and modern web technologies. Currently working at LeadBest, developing blockchain data analysis platforms and multi-chain wallets.
profile.bio: Frontend Developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences with modern technologies.

leadbest.description: Frontend Developer responsible for developing blockchain data analysis platforms and multi-chain wallets.

detail.1: Developed a blockchain data analysis platform integrating DEX and DeFi protocols to improve security and user experience.
detail.2: Built a multi-chain wallet and successfully integrated Bitcoin L2 Liquid, Ethereum, and Tron modules, expanding the range of supported on-chain assets.
detail.3: Designed and implemented highly reusable modules such as TradingView chart components and AI chat interfaces, significantly increasing code reuse across three projects.
detail.4: Introduced GitHub Actions to automate CI/CD workflows, reducing manual testing time by 30% and ensuring high-quality deployments.
detail.5: Led technical upgrades and refactoring of legacy projects (such as migrating React v16 to v18), greatly improving system maintainability and long-term scalability.
detail.6: Coordinated design, PM, and backend teams via Scrum, providing feasibility advice and technical solutions.

detail.1: Responsible for code review and mentoring newcomers, significantly improving merge success rate and effectively reducing the number of bug reports.
detail.2: Optimized the monorepo architecture with Turborepo and modular design, greatly shortening overall development time.
detail.3: Improved operation dashboards for data visualization, reducing manual tracking and reporting time.
detail.4: Adopted Hasura with GraphQL to reduce backend logic implementation costs and increase development efficiency.
detail.5: Migrated a legacy PHP-based project to Next.js, supported the team with code review, and refactored features according to client requirements.
detail.6: Built an interactive ECharts-based dashboard for a multi-tenant event management system, enabling real-time data visualization and activity tracking.
